    static void
    deleteBooking(int bookingID)
    Deletes a booking form the database given a b bookingID Initially all data is deleted from the Bookings_Tables which stores the reserved tables then the Bookings itself is deleted from the Bookings table
    static void
    returnBookings()
    Retruns bookings from the database which have status ID of 1 or 2, which means bookings that are either confirmed or arrived, these are loaded onto the program.
    static void

    Set status of a booking to Arrived in the database given a bookingID Updates the BookingStatusbookingStatusID column in the Bookings table to 2 for "Arrived"
    static void
    setBookingStatusToCompleted(int bookingID)
    Set status of a booking to Completed in the database given a bookingID Updates the BookingStatusbookingStatusID column in the Bookings table to 3 for "Completed"

  • Method Details

    • createBooking

      public static int[] createBooking(int numOfPeople, int waiterID, String customerName, String contactNumber, long startTime, long endTime, int[] tableIDs)
      Creates a new booking and inserts it into the database
      Parameters:
      numOfPeople - Number of people attending
      waiterID - ID of the waiter serving the booking
      customerName - Name of the customer that made the booking
      contactNumber - Customer's contact number
      startTime - Start time of the booking in UNIX timestamp format
      endTime - End time of the booking in UNIX timestamp format
      tableIDs - Array of tableIDs reserved for this booking
      Returns:
      An array which contains the bookingID and the coverIDs

    • returnBookings

      public static void returnBookings()
      Retruns bookings from the database which have status ID of 1 or 2, which means bookings that are either confirmed or arrived, these are loaded onto the program. For each booking it returns the corresponding tableIDs reseved and the coverIDs loadBooking method is called to store the booking locally in the program

    • deleteBooking

      public static void deleteBooking(int bookingID)
      Deletes a booking form the database given a b bookingID Initially all data is deleted from the Bookings_Tables which stores the reserved tables then the Bookings itself is deleted from the Bookings table
      Parameters:
      bookingID - ID of the booking to delete

    • setBookingStatusToArrived

      public static void setBookingStatusToArrived(int bookingID)
      Set status of a booking to Arrived in the database given a bookingID Updates the BookingStatusbookingStatusID column in the Bookings table to 2 for "Arrived"
      Parameters:
      bookingID - Id of the booking to set as arrived

    • setBookingStatusToCompleted

      public static void setBookingStatusToCompleted(int bookingID)
      Set status of a booking to Completed in the database given a bookingID Updates the BookingStatusbookingStatusID column in the Bookings table to 3 for "Completed"
      Parameters:
      bookingID - Id of the booking to set as completed
